original_text: Go and study what it says in the Bible. God says there, “I want people to be kind to each other. I do not want them only to offer sacrifices to me.” Some people think that they always obey God. I did not come to help people like that. Some people know that they have done wrong things. I am asking those people to come to me for help.’
korean_text: 너희는 가서 내가 긍휼을 원하고 제사를 원하지 아니하노라 하신 뜻이 무엇인지 배우라 나는 의인을 부르러 온 것이 아니요 죄인을 부르러 왔노라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: Go and study what it says in the Bible.
I want people to be kind to each other.
I do not want them only to offer sacrifices to me.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들이 나에게 제물만 드리기를 원하지 않습니다.

sentences.original_text: Some people think that they always obey God.
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람들은 자신이 항상 하나님께 순종한다고 생각합니다.

sentences.original_text: I did not come to help people like that.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그런 사람들을 돕기 위해 온 것이 아닙니다.

sentences.original_text: Some people know that they have done wrong things.
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람들은 자신이 잘못된 일을 했다는 것을 압니다.

sentences.original_text: I am asking those people to come to me for help.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그 사람들이 내게 와서 도움을 구하도록 요청하고 있습니다.
